title: Youngy Johnson
text: John Gottfred "Youngy" Johnson (July 22, 1873 in <a href="San%20Francisco">San Francisco</a> – August 28, 1936 in <a href="Berkeley%2C%20California">Berkeley, California</a>) was an American <a href="baseball%20player">baseball player</a>. He played in the <a href="National%20League">National League</a> with the <a href="Philadelphia%20Phillies">Philadelphia Phillies</a> and the <a href="New%20York%20Giants%20%28NL%29">New York Giants</a>. He played his first game on April 29, 1897.
